title: BALFRON TOWER typeface anyone?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BALFRON_6143.jpg)

interesting dropped 'W', curious to know more about this...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BALFRON.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/typophile.com/files/BALFRON.jpg) | 59.77 KB |
author: mvor

comments.content: Don't know the original name but here are some digital alternatives (mainly reworking /W centre apex and sometimes /R leg): [Libel Suit](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/libel-suit), [Ticketbook](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suomi/ticketbook), [Monopol](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/monopol), [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/garage-gothic), [Alégre Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/www.dafont.com/alegre-sans-nc.font), [Preussische IV 44 Ausgabe 3](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/www.dafont.com/preussischeiv44ausgabe3.font), [Movie Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/www.dafont.com/sf-movie-poster.font), [Komu](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dizajndesign/komu) B

Thanks Ryuk

- -some of these are close, methinks that this one  
 [http://www.dafont.com/alegre-sans-nc.font?text=BALFRON+TOWER&psize=l](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204527/http:/www.dafont.com/alegre-sans-nc.font?text=BALFRON+TOWER&psize=l "http://www.dafont.com/alegre-sans-nc.font?text=BALFRON+TOWER&psize=l")  
gets closest to the scale / feel of the signage, but would need editing a 'W'

best regards
